titles: A true relation concerning the late fight at Torrington between the forces under the command of Sir Thomas Fairfax, and the forces under the command of Lord Hopton and others : sent in a letter to the Honorable William Lenthal Esq., speaker of the Honorable House of Commons, and by him appointed to be forthwith printed and published.
author: Rushworth, John, 1612?-1690.
Lenthall, William, 1591-1662.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Sources.
